pesticide.PPE: Coveralls over long-sleeved shirt and long pants, rubber gloves, chemical resistant footwear plus socks, and protective eyewear (goggles or face shield) when handling undiluted product; long-sleeved shirt and long pants, and shoes plus socks when handling diluted product

Safety_Information.general_Info: DANGER CORROSIVE: Causes irreversible eye damage and skin burns. Harmful if absorbed through the skin, if swallowed, or if inhaled.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor. Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth if possible. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Probable mucosal damage may contraindicate the use of gastric lavage.

Application_Info.application_Method: Immerse seeds and let soak for two minutes; remove and allow to drain. Do not rinse.

Target_Disease_Pest.name: Fusarium (root-rot, leaf spot, Pink Snow Mold)
